title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Taoiseach) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (taoiseach) order 2023

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Taoiseach with effect from 17 
December 2022. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [166] 3
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser taoiseach effect 17 december 2022 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 24th march 2023 166 3
